title: How to Contribute
text: Pull requests issues welcome! File issue opening pull request can discuss.

title: How to Contribute
text: data-raw/corpus contains raw text works. change addition/removal datasets must done directory. generate_data.R script automates creating datasets accompanying documentation raw text files. Thus process changes require updating raw data generate_data.R script running generate_data.R generate changes datasets docs.

title: How to Contribute
text: Issues provide details bugs, dataset errors, feature requests. Ensure isn’t already open issue pull request issue opening.

title: How to Contribute
text: File issue wait reply starting work Fork clone repo Install pre-commit hooks Create new branch Make changes Run generate_data.R script made changes raw text files data documentation Render README.md README.qmd made changes README Ensure R-CMD-check passes Run build_github_site.R script preview {pkgdown} site Submit PR

title: Authors and Citation
text: Jordan Bradford. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Bradford J (2024). lovecraftr: H. P. Lovecraft's works, text analysis. https://github.com/jrdnbradford/lovecraftr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {lovecraftr: H. P. Lovecraft's works, for text analysis},   author = {Jordan Bradford},   year = {2024},   url = {https://github.com/jrdnbradford/lovecraftr/}, }

what: H. P. Lovecraft's works, for text analysis
title: H. P. Lovecraft's works, for text analysis
text: merciful thing world, think, inability human mind correlate contents. live placid island ignorance midst black seas infinity, meant voyage far. sciences, straining direction, hitherto harmed us little; day piecing together dissociated knowledge open terrifying vistas reality, frightful position therein, shall either go mad revelation flee light peace safety new dark age. -H. P. Lovecraft, Call Cthulhu {lovecraftr} contains H. P. Lovecraft’s corpus R datasets textual analysis. repository contains raw text files RDA files. See package index reference list available works.

title: H. P. Lovecraft's works, for text analysis
text: Install GitHub using methods .

title: H. P. Lovecraft's works, for text analysis

H. P. Lovecraft's works, for text analysis
H. P. Lovecraft's works, for text analysis
text: See package index reference documentation works usage. package loaded, character vectors individual works can accessed several ways. can load dataset environment directly using: can also assign dataset variable:
code: data(the_call_of_cthulhu) corpus <- lovecraft  corpus |>   dplyr::filter(title == "The Call of Cthulhu") |>   head() #> # A tibble: 6 × 2 #>   title               text                                                       #>   <chr>               <chr>                                                      #> 1 The Call of Cthulhu "THE CALL OF CTHULHU"                                      #> 2 The Call of Cthulhu ""                                                         #> 3 The Call of Cthulhu "Of such great powers or beings there may be conceivably … #> 4 The Call of Cthulhu "of a hugely remote period when...consciousness was manif… #> 5 The Call of Cthulhu "shapes and forms long since withdrawn before the tide of… #> 6 The Call of Cthulhu "humanity...forms of which poetry and legend alone have c…

title: H. P. Lovecraft's works, for text analysis
text: Please cite package use .
code: citation("lovecraftr") #> To cite package 'lovecraftr' in publications use: #>  #>   Bradford J (2024). _lovecraftr: H. P. Lovecraft's works, for text #>   analysis_. <https://github.com/jrdnbradford/lovecraftr/>. #>  #> A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is #>  #>   @Manual{, #>     title = {lovecraftr: H. P. Lovecraft's works, for text analysis}, #>     author = {Jordan Bradford}, #>     year = {2024}, #>     url = {https://github.com/jrdnbradford/lovecraftr/}, #>   }

text: Fix missing spaces “Thing Doorstep”

title: lovecraftr 1.0.0.9000 (Development Version)
text: Fix broken links CONTRIBUTING GitHub site (#40)

title: lovecraftr 1.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-11-14 release 1.0.0 signals stable API base infrastructure maintain datasets documentation.

title: lovecraftr 1.0.0
text: vignettes/copyright-status.Rmd explains copyright status works NEWS.md, file, documents changes updates README addition lifecycle R package version badges CONTRIBUTING.md overhauled

title: lovecraftr 1.0.0
text: generate_data.R adds reference copyright-status.Rmd dataset documentation, along minor updates

title: lovecraftr 1.0.0
text: datasets now use version 3 RDA serialization format
